Name: installed
Description: True if this version of this extension is currently\ninstalled

Name: superuser
Description: True if only superusers are allowed to install this\nextension

Name: relocatable
Description: True if extension can be relocated to another schema

Name: schema
Description: Name of the schema that the extension must be installed into,\nor NULL if partially or fully relocatable

Name: requires
Description: Names of prerequisite extensions, or NULL if none

Name: comment
Description: Comment string from the extension's control file
